misc: Bags Miura irons and is rumoured to sleep with them.
biography: Hailing from Hirsala Golf, Miso is a prominent figure in the annual Hector Trophée.  A seasoned competitor, Miso has consistently demonstrated skill and determination across multiple appearances, participating in the tournament since 2022.

Miso's impressive track record includes a remarkable victory at the Hector Trophée III, showcasing his ability to perform under pressure in a team setting. While he has yet to claim the individual Victor trophy, his consistent presence in the tournament, coupled with his impressive win, solidifies his place among the Hector Trophée's elite players.

Known for his meticulous approach to the game, Miso is famed for his unique attachment to his Miura irons – a set of clubs so integral to his game, that rumor has it he sleeps with them.  This dedication translates onto the course, where he demonstrates unwavering focus and precision, showcasing the level of skill he possesses.
